articles.title: After Australia cancels submarine order, French President Emmanuel Macron tells Europeans to stop being naïve - ABC News
articles.description: The French President makes his first public comments about the acrimonious ending of the deal, which saw the Australian government terminate a $90bn contract with French defence company Naval Group.
articles.content:
French President Emmanuel Macron has said Europeans must stop being so "naive" after Australia's decision to cancel a $90 billion submarine deal with France earlier this month.
